name: Predators and Prey
description:
You play as a T-Rex who can eat herbivores and rival predators. You must protect the last herd of Triceratops to save them from extinction. If they die out then you wont have enough food and you'll die too!

You'll have to balance between having lots of food avalable and not starving!

Controls : T-Rex will follow your mouse and you click to eat

Top 10 High Scores (Comment or message to get on the board):

  1. 3350 - Protec
  2. 2890 - Fraser
  3. 1035 - Shirley

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together". All assests except for music created by myself. Music from playonloop.com
